snippet.title: 【60fps動画版】2017年4月1日 そんなんアリカ公開配信会場にて『対戦会』実施！！
snippet.description:
※画面はエイプリルフール2017の物です
※This video is from April Fools 2017 of ARIKA Co.,Ltd.

Regarding games and videos released on April 1st.

These are April Fools' story and not being officially considered for release at this stage.
So even if you contact the official ARIKA Corporation, there is nothing you can do at this time.

Also, currently there are many similar inquiries to stakeholders such as Super Sweep Co., Ltd., so they do not know circumstances at all, so please do not make an inquiry.


Likewise, please refrain from requesting and giving opinions other than ARIKA absolutely because it is only politically negative.

We are extremely grateful for your love for the EX series.
We are considering prospectively based on this response, but we can not answer anything yet.

Please support messages when you concentrate on @arika_co_jp.

Thank you very much.

※画面はエイプリルフール2017の物です
※This video is from April Fools 2017 of ARIKA Co.,Ltd.

Regarding games and videos released on April 1st.

These are April Fools' story and not being officially considered for release at this stage.
So even if you contact the official ARIKA Corporation, there is nothing you can do at this time.

Also, currently there are many similar inquiries to stakeholders such as Super Sweep Co., Ltd., so they do not know circumstances at all, so please do not make an inquiry.


Likewise, please refrain from requesting and giving opinions other than ARIKA absolutely because it is only politically negative.

We are extremely grateful for your love for the EX series.
